# [Government Tender Announcement: Bridge Cleaning Services](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20309316?extsite=MjAzMDkzMTZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
## Tender Details

* Tender Title: Bridge Cleaning Services (JC Van Horne Bridge, NB-QC)
* Tender Reference Number: WS4683477849-Doc4683519616
* Solicitation Number: WS4683477849
* Amendment Number: 1

## Tender Information

* Tender Closing Date: July 6, 2024, 2:00 PM ET
* Expected Contract Start Date: August 28, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: None

## Service Requirement

* The contractor will provide all necessary materials, labor, equipment, and ancillaries for the provision of bridge cleaning services for the JC Van Horne Bridge.
* The services will include:
	+ Full “spring/summer” bridge cleaning (Required Services)
	+ Main Span “fall” bridge cleaning (Optional Services)

## Contract Information

* Contract Term: Two contract years (2024-2025)
* Contract Type: Services
* Geographical Area: New Brunswick and Quebec

## Procurement Method

* Competitive - Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

## Noticeable Trade Agreements

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)

## Contracting Entity

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* Contact: Nicole Fesseha (SPAC/PSPC), nicole.fesseha@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
